appShowcase.title: Shopify Image with Text Scroll Section
appShowcase.description: Create immersive storytelling experiences using a fixed image paired with smoothly scrolling text. This section helps you highlight brand stories, product details, or campaign messages in a clean, editorial-style layout.

previews.alt: Image with Text Scroll - Tablet View

mainContent.heading: What is the Image with Text Scroll Section?
paragraphs: The Image with Text Scroll section allows you to combine a fixed visual with vertically scrolling text to create a premium storytelling experience.
As visitors scroll, the text content moves while the image remains static, helping draw attention to key messages without overwhelming the layout.
This section is ideal for brand storytelling, product highlights, lookbooks, and campaign-focused content where clarity and visual balance matter.

features.title: Section Height
features.description: Set the section height automatically or define a custom height for better visual control.

features.title: Flexible Content Position
features.description: Display text content on the left or right side of the image to suit your layout.

features.title: Advanced Colors
features.description: Customize background colors, text colors, and button styles for brand consistency.

features.title: Typography Controls
features.description: Adjust font families, sizes, and spacing for headings and body text.
